metadata.description: Comprehensive test catalog extracted from open issues documentation

major_open_issues.description: Issue: Message passing overhead compared to function calls
major_open_issues.impact_area: Overall system performance is slower than monolithic kernels
resolution_criteria: Solution implemented: Reduced context switching overhead
Solution implemented: Better message caching strategies
solutions: Virtual copy optimization for large data transfers

inference_rules.rule: if issue exists and solution implemented then issue resolved

major_open_issues.impact_area: Page fault handling and memory operations slower
resolution_criteria: Solution implemented: Better integration with GNU Mach
Solution implemented: Optimized memory object protocols

inference_rules.rule: if issue exists and solution implemented then issue resolved

major_open_issues.impact_area: Cannot fully utilize modern multi-core hardware
resolution_criteria: Solution implemented: GNU Mach SMP improvements

inference_rules.rule: if issue exists and solution implemented then issue resolved

major_open_issues.description: Issue: Some server crashes can still affect system stability
major_open_issues.impact_area: System may become unresponsive after critical server failures
resolution_criteria: Solution implemented: Automatic server restart mechanisms
Solution implemented: Improved error handling and recovery

inference_rules.rule: if issue exists and solution implemented then issue resolved

major_open_issues.description: Issue: Resource leaks and exhaustion in long-running systems

inference_rules.rule: if issue exists and solution implemented then issue resolved

major_open_issues.impact_area: Hurd runs on fewer systems than other operating systems
